post.body: How's about a little surprise for LA too? :/ BTW, got FAD in the mail today :D
But I thought Modesto was nice?
Weeeird... How was the show though?
Finally. Jeebus.
I do love potatoes. I do, I do, I dooo...
Alas, I am heartbroken...
I just saw you on the TV, Andy :D Man, I couldn't see you guys at the Troubadour tonight ]:
oh my god, people are so fucked up. how dare she?! i would want to beat her ass too.
so I got FAD in the mail yesterday & I am VERY impressed :D What's your favorite song on the album, Andy?
What does the "P" in kpkane stand for?
DOOR HINGE?!
wtf, itijsmp?!
Aw, well at least you guys opened for FOB yesterday :D How'd it go?
Awww, how sweet!
Yes! Finally done & over with my psychology research paper! I'm sorry Philip Zimbardo, but that was hell...
I have anger problems.
Why does she always have to be so grouchy? >:/
I broke a nail D:
DO WE HAVE ANY ICECREAM IN THIS HOUSE?!
Yay, I ate nacho Lunchables today :D
Have you ever bought anything from TV?
My least favorite subject in history: the Indian Wars. Bleh.
Dreamt that I somehow snuck into a job as a valet for celebrities. & Pete Wentz was a douche. But Pharell was nice :D
Today, I brightened someone's day just by baking cookies & taking them to a hospital :D "Brought to you by the Foundation for a Better Life"
So, I just baked chocolate chip cookies :D
I only like fresh-baked cookies B-)
An idea is brewing in my head...
C'mon, c'mon...snow day...c'mon!!!

OMG, I want snow!!!
Well shit. I always forget things.
Why can't we just get one of those Swiffer mops?! Geez, a few extra bucks for a lot easier mopping...
D:< I don't wanna mop!
I really, REALLY don't like rain...
D: I don't like the rain!
How can I NOT be upset, when my brownies came out crunchy?!
D:< Grr! I knew I couldn't trust Amber with my brownies!
It's not just a fad...
It's only a fad...
Damnit, forgot to sync my iPod before leaving the house...
"I must not tell lies."
Well, whatever, I celebrate Christmas yesterday... :/
Ahh, I love Christmas =)
Forgot the ham?!?! Gahhh, foiled once again! D:<
Playing Braaaawl on Wii...
Feliz Navidad~~
Yes! Finally, I get my holiday ham!
Now, there's Snuggie! The blanket with sleeves! :DDD
Merry Christmas Eve, y'all!!!
Got two mondo papercuts today D:
Just saw Cloverfield, crazy movie
Oh no, It's raining...
"You'll never remember, your head is far too blurry..."
Aww, how cute, I just saw The Maine on TV :D
Ah, I love my friends...
"Go ahead & buy yourself a drink, cuz you know you're deserving of it"
Ugh, why is everyone going to bed early?!
